pr_title: Avoid File.toString for getting file's path

timeline.bodyText: Why 1.1? It looks like this method has always been there: http://web.mit.edu/java_v1.0.2/www/javadoc/java.io.File.html#getPath()
timeline.author: electrum

replies.bodyText: We use 1.1. for all. This is "day 0 for this file"
replies.author: findepi

timeline.message:
Avoid File.toString for getting file's path

File.getPath() is the canonical way to convert File to its String
representation suitable for passing to new File().
